Posts.Content: SueD wrote: I've been done with Taxol since Thanksgiving, and have had 7 treatments of radiation.  I've been experiencing hot flashes, but with in the last week, I've been getting physically ill.  I never had a problem with nausea during chemo.   Has anyone else experienced this?  I've tried the anti-nausea meds, but all they do is make me tired.  When I wake up, I still puke.  Can radiation make you puke?  If anyone has any insight or ideas, I'd be grateful. Sue Dx 4/2009, DCIS, 3cm, Stage IIIB, Grade 3, 2/13 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Nausea after chemo is over SueD SharaD
